title: Subpart 86-13 - Rates for Non-State Providers of Prevocational Services (Site-based) and Respite (Hourly and Free-standing), and fees for Prevocational Services (Community-based), Residential Habilitation (Family Care) and Supported Employment
content:
Subpart 86-13 - Rates for Non-State Providers of Prevocational Services (Site-based) and Respite (Hourly and Free-standing), and fees for Prevocational Services (Community-based), Residential Habilitation (Family Care) and Supported Employment

State Regulations
§ 86-13.1 - Applicability
§ 86-13.2 - Definitions
§ 86-13.3 - Rates for prevocational services (site-based), respite (hourly and free-standing), prevocational services (community-based), supported employment, and residential habilitation (family care)
§ 86-13.4 - Reporting requirements
§ 86-13.5 - Trend Factor
§ 86-13.6 - Transition periods and reimbursement
§ 86-13.7 - Rate corrections for prevocational services (site-based) and respite (hourly and freestanding) rates
§ 86-13.8 - Specialized template populations
§ 86-13.9 - Severability

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
